readable.title: 3526805681_38461c0d5d
readable.content: A man holding a sign with a dog on a leash . A man in a white quilted jacket holds a sign in a brick plaza , accompanied by a dog on a leash . a man on the street holding a sign while holding a small tan dog on a lease . A man with a dog stands , outside on bricks , holding a sign . A man with a sign about god stands holding the leash of a dog in a red brick square .
